doc:
Richard Sanders (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Sanders_(actor) 0 Richard Kinard Sanders (born August 23, 1940) is an American actor and screenwriter. He is best known for playing a quirky news anchorman Les Nessman on the CBS sitcom WKRP in Cincinnati (1978–1982). Richard_Kinard_Sanders ( born August_23_,_1940 ) is an_American_actor_and_screenwriter . He is_best_known for playing a_quirky_news_anchorman_Les_Nessman on the_CBS_sitcom_WKRP in Cincinnati_(_1978 – 1982_) .
